mapper.select:
SELECT cpr.PROTOCOL_CONTENT protocolContent, cpr.ARBI_CONTENT arbiContent FROM case_protocol_record cpr WHERE cpr.CASE_ID = #{caseId}
AND cpr.APPLY_TYPE = #{applyType}
